522290.name: Super Cucumber
522290.description:
Cucumber is the greatest Aardvark Superhero who has ever lived, and when a series of old enemies and new adversaries attempt to take over the world using the powers of magic, science and capitalism, it's up to him to climb to the top of six elaborate towers and defeat the forces of evil.

Complete dozens of increasingly difficult platforming levels and overcome a series of unique boss battles. After your initial playthrough, perfect your path through each world on hardcore mode and keep an eye out for secrets that may become accessible as Cucumber gains exciting new abilities!

Features:

  • Combo system and abilities Inspired by fighting games and 16-bit classics.

  • Over 100 levels purposefully designed to build your skills, then push them to the limit.

  • New secrets and challenges await after your first playthrough!

  • Hand-drawn 2D art and cute lighthearted characters.

  • Full controller and native Steam Deck support.
